p: SARS-CoV-2 enters the cell by binding onto angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) (Gurwitz 2020). Until today, no strong evidence is present that ACE2 is expressed in the liver, although a recent, non-peer reviewed, article reported its expression in cholangiocytes (Hamming et al. 2004; Chai et al. 2020).
